system.description:
A character who wears this girdle gains the strength of a hill giant.

  • Combat ability: The wearerâ€™s ability in combat is augmented: the character attacks as an 8 Hit Dice monster. (If the character already has better attack probabilities, the girdle does not alter these.)

  • Damage: The wearer inflicts [[/r 2d8]] damage in combat, or twice normal damage, if using the optional @UUID[Compendium.ose-advancedfantasytome.rules.JournalEntry.u9gtXY21VnjrwwkH.JournalEntryPage.ouf3QNv4dWj0L1IW#variable-weapon-damage-(optional-rule)]{variable weapon damage} rules.
